name: OCKCarePlanStore
desc: A store that performs read/write operations on a care plan data type.

items.name: func addCarePlan(Self.Plan, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Plan>?)
items.desc: Adds a care plan asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func addCarePlans([Self.Plan], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Plan]>?)
items.desc: Adds an array of care plans asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func updateCarePlan(Self.Plan, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Plan>?)
items.desc: Updates a care plan asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func updateCarePlans([Self.Plan], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Plan]>?)
items.desc: Updates an array of care plans asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func deleteCarePlan(Self.Plan, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Plan>?)
items.desc: Deletes a care plan asynchronously from the store.

items.name: func deleteCarePlans([Self.Plan], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Plan]>?)
items.desc: Deletes an array of care plans asynchronously from the store.
